@description.name: @description
@description.body: The TextArea is a multi-line text input field.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var?null} The value of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the {@link #changeValue} event should be fired on every key input. If set to true, the changeValue event is equal to the {@link #input} event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Maximal number of characters that can be entered in the input field.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: String value which will be shown as a hint if the field is all of: unset, unfocused and enabled. Set to null to not show a placeholder text.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the field is read only

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is valid. If a widget is invalid, an invalid state will be set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which will be shown in an tooltip if the widget is invalid.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which will be shown in an invalid tooltip if the {@link #required} is set to true.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Model property for storing additional information for the including object. It can act as value property on form items for example. Be careful using that property as this is used for the {@link qx.ui.form.MModelSelection} it has some restrictions:

  • Don't use equal models in one widget using the {@link qx.ui.form.MModelSelection}.
  • Avoid setting only some model properties if the widgets are added to a {@link qx.ui.form.MModelSelection} widget. Both restrictions result of the fact, that the set models are deputies for their widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Synchronizes the elements.scrollHeight and its height. Needed for making textArea scrollable.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the parent scroll container of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the field model value. Should also update the UI.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var|null} Updates the field with the new model value.
@param.description: Updates the field with the new model value.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{null|Error} Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).
@return.description:
Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the model value to its initial value. Should also update the UI.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a consistent and up-to-date model value. Note: returned value can also be a promise of type Promise<*|null>.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {var|null} The model value plain or as promise.
@return.description: The model value plain or as promise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the enabled state of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current set enabled state.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the required state of a widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: required {Boolean} A flag signaling if the widget is required.
@param.description: A flag signaling if the widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current required state of the widget.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} True, if the widget is required.
@return.description: True, if the widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the valid state of the widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: valid {Boolean} The valid state of the widget.
@param.description: The valid state of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the valid state of the widget.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} If the state of the widget is valid.
@return.description: If the state of the widget is valid.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the invalid message of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the invalid message of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the invalid message if required of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the invalid message if required of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the representative data for the item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the representative data for the item

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the representative data to null.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Converts the incoming value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for focus event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for blur event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether this widget has focus or not.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the {@link #changeValue} event occurs.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: evt {qx.event.type.Data} The event, containing the changed content.
@param.description: The event, containing the changed content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the {@link #input} event occurs.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: evt {qx.event.type.Data} The event, containing the changed content.
@param.description: The event, containing the changed content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the caret position of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the caret position on this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fires the {@link #changeValue} event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} The current value to fire.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property liveUpdate. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #liveUpdate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property liveUpdate. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #liveUpdate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property liveUpdate. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #liveUpdate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property liveUpdate. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #liveUpdate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Points the focus of the form to this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes the focus from this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds a state to the element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: state {String} the state to be added

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks whether the element has the state passed as argument

@param.name: @param
@param.body: state {String} the state to be checked

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the element has the state, false if it doesn't.
@return.description: true if the element has the state, false if it doesn't.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes a state from the element

@param.name: @param
@param.body: state {String} the state to be removed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Replaces a state of the element with a new state. If the element doesn't have the state to be removed, then th new state will just be added.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: oldState {String} the state to be replaced

@param.name: @param
@param.body: newState {String} the state to get injected in the oldState's place
@param.description: the state to get injected in the oldState's place

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the model value was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the enabled state was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the valid state was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the invalidMessage was modified

@description.name: @description

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the model data changes

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The event is fired on every keystroke modifying the value of the field. The method {@link qx.event.type.Data#getData} returns the current value of the text field.
